p.k: This chapter shows how René must adjust to being without technology in the home. We will see a giraffe fighting in the outside of the house. They will output a group survival, learn to fish, light a fire naturally, rehydrate and feed always looking for ways to utilize the resources of nature. René will tell us about the danger of crocodiles in the rivers to fish, as well as hyenas at night for campers. We observe how the links between participants are strengthened through teamwork.
